issue.title: Uparrow
issue.body: Initial up and down arrow message cycling functionality. Needs some work. Also switches user message alignment back to right.

issue.title: Change Weather response
issue.body: As of right now the weather response is very general and doesn't fit with PizzaRat's snarky attitude. Map his responses based on weather information to give us more of that personality from PizzaRat we've grown to love.

issue.title: Fix twilio texting
issue.body: Fixed texting bug after `responses.js` method `handle` was changed to `getResponses`.

issue.title: Fix twilio texting
issue.body: Fixed texting bug after `responses.js` method `handle` was changed to `getResponses`.

issue.title: Add Pizza Rat's Twilio number to the homepage
issue.body: Gotta let the general public know that not only is Pizza Rat available through a beautiful web interface, but can be texted as well.
